verbs.description: [ARG1: glass] [V: is] [ARGM-NEG: no longer] [ARG2: green] we know plastic bags and pizza boxes are a recycling taboo now there another one to add to the list of no no glass several trash haulers have started sending letters to customers telling them to stop putting glass in their recycling bins custom disposal cobb county georgia atlanta council city manager david junger decatur carla smith westrock atlanta
